references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces DINO, a self-supervised vision transformer used for image feature extraction in LAM3D, a crucial component of the model's image-point-cloud alignment.
This paper introduces the tri-plane representation for 3D shapes, which is central to LAM3D's point cloud compression and image-point-cloud alignment modules.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, the foundation for LAM3D's image-point-cloud alignment technique, enabling the alignment of image features to the latent tri-planes.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces NeRF, neural radiance fields, which are implicitly referenced as the foundation of several single-view 3D reconstruction methods that LAM3D improves upon.

references.paper_title: LRM: Large reconstruction model for single image to 3d
references.reason: This paper introduces LRM, a single-image-to-3D reconstruction model that LAM3D builds upon, improving upon its limitations by incorporating 3D point cloud data for enhanced fidelity.
